name: LISA: The Unbreakable: Badass Haggar Mod
name_original: LISA: The Unbreakable: Badass Haggar Mod
description:
A solo release of small reverse fight mod originally created back in 2021, where you take the role of some of the Haggar crew from the game LISA: The Unbreakable and fight some of the main characters from the game.

Credits:

  • Stag -  (Sprites + Planning)
  • Chirag - (Animations + RPG maker)
  • Sie - Sprites + RPG maker
  • Dale - Sprites
  • Dirge - RPG maker assistance

Special Thanks: 

  • Octo
  • Beasuce
  • AAA/Zane
  • FredFuchs (FxF) - Original designer of the characters used in this mod and the game from which they originate: "Lisa: The Unbreakable"
  • And everyone else.
